reviews.name: Apple Lightning to USB Cable
reviews.reviewText: I've already owned two aftermarket lightning cables and both have failed miserably. Buying several cheap products ends up being more expensive in the long run. Jut buy the Apple cable and save your money.
reviews.title: Best possible lightning cable

reviews.name: Apple Lightning to USB Cable
reviews.reviewText: First of all I had to pay 20 bucks for this cable. Seriously? 20 bucks just for a cable? No wall unit included? It worked fine for the first couple of weeks then all the sudden it decided when it was going to work. It finally broke after only having it for a month. What kind of specialty charger dies after only a month? I ended up buying a cheaper one from Walgreens and its excellent after 4 months of use.
reviews.title: Apple's Value Strikes Again

reviews.name: Apple Lightning to USB Cable
reviews.reviewText: I can understand why Apple needed to improve the connector on my iPhone 5 and new iPad. It works great and is reversible, which is convenient. But I've got six or seven devices, including the iPhone connector built into my car, clock radio dock, etc., that use the old connector. It's a shame to pay $19.95 to $29.95 for adapters/cables, especially since I've had to buy five of them. But they do work well.
reviews.title: Works great. Too bad Apple prices them so high.

reviews.name: Apple Lightning to USB Cable
reviews.reviewText: It is a real Appple lightning cable that was not available anywhere else including Apple wihtout a 2 week wait. Getting it in 3 days was awesome.
reviews.title: 11 November 2012

reviews.name: Apple Lightning to USB Cable
reviews.reviewText: If you have the new iPhone, iPod or iPad you don't have much choice if you want to charge your device. Walmart had the cable and got it to me quickly.
reviews.title: Lightning to USB
